item.title: Allmaps
item.description: Project director on *Making Open-Source Georeferencing Software Collections-Ready with the Allmaps Platform* (NEH DHAG Award HAA-293491-23), a joint project to expand and develop the Allmaps software ecosystem created by Bert Spaan and Jules Schoonman

item.title: Processing Place
item.description: Curated the Leventhal Map & Education Center's exhibition on the human role in computer map-making, *Processing Place: How Computers and Cartographers Redrew our World*, on display September 2024â€“March 2025
